class.name: InvestigationsAutoAssigner
class.description: A [build feature](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-investigations-auto-assigner) assigning investigations of build failures automatically based on heuristics

function.name: investigationsAutoAssigner
function.description: Configures Investigations Auto Assigner behaviour. @see InvestigationsAutoAssigner

param.name: defaultAssignee.username
param.description: Username of a user to whom an investigation is assigned if no other possible investigator is found.

param.name: excludeAssignees.usernames
param.description: The newline-separated list of usernames to exclude from investigation auto-assignment.
